TextLibrary.Text: Patch
We found the man who was looking for you. He was an Imperial Assassin from the Selentine Empire. I bet you have quite a story to tell.
We found the man who was looking for you. He was an Imperial Assassin from the Selentine Empire. I bet you have quite a story to tell.
We found the man who was looking for you. He was an Imperial Assassin from the Selentine Empire. I bet you have quite a story to tell.
We found the man who was looking for you. He was an Imperial Assassin from the Selentine Empire. I bet you have quite a story to tell.
You are my friend! FRIEND! I will pay you! Here, take 1000 Gold! My name is Patch by the way.
You are my friend! FRIEND! I will pay you! Here, take 1000 Gold! My name is Patch by the way.
You are my friend! FRIEND! I will pay you! Here, take 1000 Gold! My name is Patch by the way.
You are my friend! FRIEND! I will pay you! Here, take 1000 Gold! My name is Patch by the way.
One thousand Gold? All I did was scare away an Assassin. What did you do that made them chase you all the way up here?
One thousand Gold? All I did was scare away an Assassin. What did you do that made them chase you all the way up here?
One thousand Gold? All I did was scare away an Assassin. What did you do that made them chase you all the way up here?

I took some things...
I took some things...
I took some things...
I took some things...
What kind of things did you take? And who did you take them from?
What kind of things did you take? And who did you take them from?
What kind of things did you take? And who did you take them from?
What kind of things did you take? And who did you take them from?
Shiny things... pretty things... I took them from the Chieftain. He was very mad...
Shiny things... pretty things... I took them from the Chieftain. He was very mad...
Shiny things... pretty things... I took them from the Chieftain. He was very mad...
Shiny things... pretty things... I took them from the Chieftain. He was very mad...
The Chieftain? In Selentia... ah... you stole treasure from the Selentine Emperor?

Ummm... Yes.
Ummm... Yes.
Ummm... Yes.
Ummm... Yes.
What did you take exactly? Describe it.
What did you take exactly? Describe it.
What did you take exactly? Describe it.
What did you take exactly? Describe it.
I took a Giant's Bracelet, and a Stick, and a Ball, and lots of glittery coins.

A Giant's Bracelet. That's an odd thing. And a Stick and a Ball.... Oh...

You stole the Crown Jewels! The Crown, Orb and Scepter of Selentia!
